casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 2, 2008

[Cite as 05/02/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-2051.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-0525. State v. Jones.

Summit C.P. No. CR-2007-04-1294. This cause is pending before the court as a death penalty appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Summit County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for extension of time to transmit the record,

It is ordered by the court that the motion for extension of time to transmit the record is granted, and the time for transmitting the record is extended to July 14, 2008.
